Prospective Ph.D. Student

Hello, I’m Yilin

I am a second-year MSc student supervised by Pro. Bertram Ludäscher and Pro. Matthew J Turk in the School of Information Sciences at the University of Illinois at Urbana-Champaign
My research focus is broadly Human-Centered Data Science, specifically using techniques from Visualization, Data Management and Human-Computer Interaction to help people better understand and utilize data in the meanwhile ensuring transparency and reproducibility
Previous projects can be found here! Find my Resume and let us do something fun !
